title: Field Sales Representative, Google Cloud
description: As a member of the Google Cloud team, you inspire leading companies, schools, and government agencies to work smarter with Google tools like Google Workspace, Search, and Chrome. Using your passion for Google products, you help spread the magic of Google to organizations around the world.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 7 years of sales experience in the technology industry with SaaS, PaaS or IaaS products and platforms. 5 years of experience in a sales, partner or channel manager role. Experience developing Cloud or IT solutions. Ability to communicate in Japanese fluently and in English at business level.
preferred_qualifications: 8 years of experience with field sales in the technology industry, working with large enterprise or strategic accounts. Ability to consistently work towards strategic goals. Ability to balance engaged priorities and manage several time-sensitive projects with minimal direction in a fast-paced environment. Excellent strategic and problem-solving skills. Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills. Ability to communicate in English fluently.
responsibilities: Generate and qualify leads and business opportunities. Plan and implement the channel promotion program. Qualify and assist customers in identifying use cases suitable for Google Cloud deployment, articulate key differentiators and typical customer buying journeys, and generally display a passion for computer science and Cloud. Manage multiple opportunities through the entire business cycle simultaneously, working with cross-functional teams as necessary, and represent Google at trade shows and industry events.
